oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pīr Imām Shāh, Pīr Sohodev, Pīr Shams, ... [et al.]].
Hard board covers, binding in fragile condition; pages in fair condition, stained.
MS Indic 2534. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
In various Indic languages in Khojki script.
With: Mûmaņ:ćitāmaṇī / Pīr Imām Shāh ; Jaṇkār / Pīr Imām Shāh ; Garbīs / Pīr Imām Shāh ; Ginān:taîe:tame / Pīr Sohodev ; Prabhātīo / Pīr Sohodev. Ends with prayer seeking forgiveness for sins.
